name: Sentius
description: For product managers that have problem with keeping track of promises given/taken and having lack of people to delegate tasks to, Sentius Copilot provides a way to track tasks and a way to autonomously execute some of these tasks.
one_liner: For product managers that have problem with keeping track of promises given/taken and having lack of people to delegate tasks to, Sentius Copilot provides a way to track tasks and a way to autonomously execute some of these tasks.
